title: Board game Azul
descriptions:
**Board Game Azul by Next Move - A Family Game of Patterns and Strategy**

Immerse yourself in the colorful world of Azul, the award-winning board game from Next Move, where family and friends can gather to compete in creating the most beautiful mosaic patterns. Designed by the acclaimed Michael Riesling, Azul offers a unique blend of strategy and aesthetics that will captivate players of all ages.

**Key Features:**
- **Brand:** Next Move
- **Material:** High-quality paper components that ensure durability and a premium tactile experience.
- **Theme:** Patterns - inspired by the stunning aesthetics of Moorish art, players will be engaged in a visual treat as they play.
- **Genre:** Family - Azul is designed to be enjoyed by players of all ages, making it perfect for family game nights or casual get-togethers.
- **Number of Players:** Flexible gameplay for 2 to 4 players, allowing for an intimate duel or a dynamic four-player competition.
- **Designer:** Michael Riesling has crafted a game that is not only visually appealing but also rich in strategic depth.
- **Components Quality:** Players will appreciate the high-quality game components that elevate the gaming experience, ensuring that Azul stands the test of time and play.

Whether you're a seasoned gamer or new to the hobby, Azul is an excellent addition to any game collection. Easy to learn yet challenging to master, it promises countless hours of fun as you and your fellow artisans compete to claim the title of the greatest mosaic creator. Get ready to be captivated by the spellbinding beauty of Azul!

**Azul Board Game by Next Move Games – A Beautiful Family Game of Patterns and Strategy**

Immerse yourself in the artistic mosaic detailing of the Azul Board Game, a captivating family game that combines beauty, strategy, and fun, suitable for players aged 8 and up. Designed by the renowned Michael Riesling, Azul invites you to embellish the walls of the Royal Palace of Evora with ornate tiles.

**Product Highlights:**

- **Brand:** Next Move Games
- **Material:** Premium Paper Components
- **Theme:** Mesmerizing Patterns
- **Genre:** Family Board Game
- **Number of Players:** 2 to 4 players
- **Designer:** Michael Riesling
- **Components Quality:** High-quality materials for durability and a great tactile experience.

**Engaging Gameplay:**
With a simple yet strategic play style, Azul is perfect for both casual family game nights and competitive friends eager to challenge each other's pattern-building skills. The game is designed for 2 to 4 players, ensuring that whether you're looking for an intimate duel or a group challenge, Azul can accommodate.

**Elegant Design:**
The high-quality paper materials used in Azul ensure that every game piece is durable and pleasing to the touch, enhancing the overall gaming experience. The game's components are crafted to showcase the vivid, eye-catching patterns that are central to the game's theme.

**Award-Winning Experience:**
Azul has earned acclaim for its blend of beautiful aesthetics and engaging gameplay, making it an award-winning choice for any board game enthusiast.

Bring home the wonder of Azul today and discover the intricate beauty of pattern building and strategy that has captured the hearts of board game lovers around the world. Whether you're gifting it to a friend or adding it to your own collection, Azul by Next Move Games promises to deliver countless hours of enjoyment and artistic expression for everyone at the table.

**Azul Board Game by Next Move - Strategy Family Game for 2-4 Players**

Step into a world of intricate patterns and vibrant designs with the award-winning Azul Board Game, crafted by the renowned board game designer Michael Riesling. Azul invites you to embellish the walls of the Royal Palace of Evora with exquisite Moorish decorative tiles. This game is a feast for the eyes as well as the mind, offering both aesthetic pleasure and strategic depth.

**Key Features:**

- **Product Name:** Board Game Azul
- **Brand:** Next Move Games
- **Material:** High-quality paper components, ensuring durability and a premium tactile experience.
- **Theme:** Inspired by the beautiful aesthetic of Moorish art, players compete to create patterns.
- **Genre:** A family-friendly game that’s easy to learn but offers deep strategic gameplay, making it enjoyable for both casual and serious gamers.
- **Number of Players:** Designed for 2 to 4 players, perfect for game nights with friends or family.
- **Designer:** The game is the brainchild of Michael Riesling, whose expertise in game design is evident in every aspect of Azul.
- **Components Quality:** The game boasts high-quality components that stand up to repeated play and add to the overall enjoyment of the game.

**Gameplay:**

Players take turns drafting colored tiles from suppliers to their player board. Later in the round, players score points based on how they've placed their tiles to decorate the palace. Extra points are scored for specific patterns and completing sets; wasted supplies harm the player's score. The player with the most points at the end of the game wins.

**Contents:**

- 100 Resin Tiles
- 4 Player Boards
- 9 Factory Displays
- 4 Scoring Markers
- 1 Starting Player Marker
- 1 Linen Bag
- Rulebook

**Why Azul Is a Must-Have:**

Azul stands out in the board game market with its perfect blend of beauty and strategy. Its simple rules make it accessible for newcomers, while the depth of strategy keeps the game fresh for seasoned players. The high-quality materials and beautiful artistry in the game's design ensure that Azul is not just a game but a work of art that you will be proud to display on your shelf and play on your table.

Gather your friends and family and discover why Azul has received worldwide acclaim and numerous awards. Whether you're a strategic thinker or someone who appreciates the finer things in life, Azul is the perfect addition to your board game collection.

**Order your copy of Azul today and start creating your masterpiece!**
